coreAttributes.authorTag: 'MFD by DSG Threadworks' has been printed onto the inside of the webbing's backing.
coreAttributes.name: canvas webbing
coreAttributes.description: Consisting of a belt, suspenders, and two generously sized pouches, this piece of equipment allows the wearer to carry and quickly access loads that would be otherwise too awkward or heavy.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the webbing and securely [npc.verb(buckle)] the belt around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the webbing onto [npc2.name] and [npc.verb(buckle)] the belt around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the webbing onto [npc2.name] and roughly [npc.verb(buckle)] the belt around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbuckle)] the belt and [npc.verb(take)] off the webbing.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbuckle)] the belt from around [npc2.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(take)] off the webbing.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unbuckle)] the belt from around [npc2.namePos] waist and [npc.verb(tears)] the webbing from [npc2.namePos] torso.
